title: PART THE THIRD
content:
MY TERM OF OFFICE
 
This part was commenced at Versailles on the 16th of September 1851, during the prorogation of the National Assembly.
 
To come at once to this part of my recollections, I pass over the previous period, which extends from the end of the days of June 1848 to the 3rd of June 1849. I return to it later if I have time. I have thought it more important, while my recollections are still fresh in my mind, to recall the five months during which I was a member of the Government.
